statements: SELECT * FROM UnstructuredData;
SELECT id, data FROM UnstructuredData;
SELECT data->'name', data->'age' FROM UnstructuredData;
SELECT * FROM UnstructuredData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, jsonb_pretty(data) FROM UnstructuredData;
SELECT * FROM UnstructuredData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, data->>'name' as name FROM UnstructuredData ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM UnstructuredData WHERE data->>'type' = 'book';
SELECT id, data->>'author' as author, data->>'title' as title FROM UnstructuredData WHERE data->>'genre' = 'sci-fi' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, jsonb_array_elements(data->'keywords') as keyword FROM UnstructuredData WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY id LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM unstructured_data;
SELECT id, data FROM unstructured_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description FROM metadata WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, created_at FROM metadata WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, description, created_at FROM metadata ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, data FROM unstructured_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description, created_at FROM metadata WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, data FROM unstructured_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT description, created_at FROM metadata WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, data FROM unstructured_data WHERE id = 3 OR id = 4;
SELECT * FROM unstructured_data_table;
SELECT id FROM unstructured_data_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data FROM unstructured_data_table WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, data FROM unstructured_data_table WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM metadata_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM unstructured_data_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, data FROM unstructured_data_table ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM metadata_table WHERE data LIKE '%important%';
SELECT id, keywords FROM indexing_table WHERE keywords->'category' = 'technology';
SELECT * FROM unstructured_data_table JOIN metadata_table ON unstructured_data_table.id = metadata_table.id;
SELECT * FROM unstructured_data_records;
SELECT id, data FROM unstructured_data_records ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT tag_name FROM data_tags WHERE tag_id = 3;
SELECT data_mapping.mapping_id, data_tags.tag_name FROM data_mapping JOIN data_tags ON data_mapping.tag_id = data_tags.tag_id;
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM data_metadata WHERE data_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM unstructured_data_records ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT data->>'name' AS data_name, data->>'age' AS data_age FROM unstructured_data_records WHERE id = 5;
SELECT tag_name FROM data_tags WHERE tag_id IN (SELECT tag_id FROM data_mapping WHERE data_id = 3);
SELECT data_id, COUNT(metadata_key) AS metadata_count FROM data_metadata GROUP BY data_id HAVING COUNT(metadata_key) > 1;
SELECT * FROM unstructured_data_records WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM table1;
SELECT id, data FROM table2 WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, created_at FROM table5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, content, tags FROM table3 WHERE id = 3 AND content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT id, url, metadata FROM table4 WHERE url LIKE '%example.com%' OR metadata ->> 'author' = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM table1 WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, created_at FROM table2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT content, tags FROM table3 WHERE tags @> '{"tag": "example"}' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT id, metadata FROM table4 WHERE metadata->>'status' = 'active';
SELECT id, description, properties FROM table5 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
